articles.title: Swarm reveals growing weak spot in Earth’s magnetic field - European Space Agency
articles.description: Using 11 years of magnetic field measurements from the European Space Agency’s Swarm satellite constellation, scientists have discovered that the weak region in Earth’s magnetic field over the South Atlantic – known as the South Atlantic Anomaly – has expande…
